sector_narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
description_narrative: The South-South Cooperation Partnership Program initiative aims to increase global progress towards the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) and to further enhance the benefits that developing countries derive from China's engagement in global development. The overall programme consists of two key elements: funding for a global issues funding facility, under which sub-programmes will be funded, and a professional-level staff position. The total value of this initiative is $1.4 million over 3 years, starting 2011-12.
